GK16visah__u:3: granthārambhe nirvinghena prāripsitaparisamāptikāmo vāṅbhayādhikṛtatayā vāgdevatāyāḥ sāṃmukhyamādhatte--
GK16visah__u:6: asya granthasya kāvyāṅgatayā kāvyaphalaireva phalavattvamiti kāvyaphalānyāha--
GK16visah__u:9: caturvargaphalaprāptihi kovyato “rāmādivatpravatitavyaṃ na rāvaṇādivat” ityādiḥ kṛtyākṛtyapravṛttinivṛttyupadeśadvāreṇa supratītaiva /
GK16visah__u:15: “ekaḥ śabdaḥ suprayuktaḥ samyagjñātaḥ svarge loke kāmadhugbhavati” ityādivedavākyebhyaśca suprasiddhaiva /
GK16visah__u:20: caturvargaprāptirhi vedaśāstrebhyo nīrasatayā duḥkhādeva pariṇatabuddhīnāmeva jāyate /
GK16visah__u:22: nanu tahi pariṇatabuddhibhiḥ satsu vedaśāstreṣu kimiti kāvye yatnaḥ karaṇīya ityapi na vaktavyam /
GK16visah__u:23: kaṭukauṣadhopaśamanīyasya rogasya sitaśarkaropaśamanīyatve kasya vā rogiṇaḥ sitaśarkarāpravṛttiḥ sādhīyasī na syāt ?
GK16visah__u:33: tena hetunā tasya kāvyasya svarūpaṃ nirūpyate /
GK16visah__u:40: “nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ /
GK16visah__u:41: dhigdhikchakrajitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā svargagrāmaṭikāviluṇṭhanavṛthocchūnaiḥ kimebhirbhujaiḥ” //
GK16visah__u:43: asya śalokasya vidheyāvimarśadoṣaduṣṭatayā kāvyatvaṃ na syāt /
GK16visah__u:47: nanu kaścidevāṃśo 'tra duṣṭo na punaḥ sarvo 'pīti cet,
GK16visah__u:49: yatra dhvaniḥ sa uttamakāvyatvaprayojaka ityaṃśābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣyamāṇamidaṃ kāvyamakāvyaṃ vā kimapi na syāt /
GK16visah__u:50: na ca kaṃcidevāṃśaṃ kāvyasya dūṣayantaḥ śratiduṣṭādayo doṣāḥ,
GK16visah__u:59: kiñca evaṃ kāvyaṃ praviralaviṣayaṃ nirviṣayaṃ vā syāt,
GK16visah__u:61: nanvīṣadarthe nañaḥ prayoga iti cettarhi “īṣaddoṣau śabdārthau kāvyam” ityukte nirdeṣayoḥ kāvyatvaṃ na syāt /
GK16visah__u:65: nahī kīṭānuvedhādayo ratnasya ratnatvaṃ vyāhantumīśāḥ kintūpādeyatāratamyameva kartum /
GK16visah__u:73: guṇānāṃ rasaikadharmatvasya “ye rasasyāṅgino dharmāḥ śauryādaya ivātmanaḥ” ityādinā tenaiva pratipāditatvāt /
GK16visah__u:77: tayoḥ kāvyasvarūpeṇābhimatayoḥ śabdārthayo raso 'sti, na vā ?
GK16visah__u:80: asti cet ? kathaṃ noktaṃ rasavantāviti viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visah__u:85: nanu “śabdārthau saguṇau” ityanenaguṇābhivyañjakau śabdārthau kāvye prayojyāvityabhiprāya iti cet ?
GK16visah__u:97: asyārthaḥ- sarvatra sālaṅkārau kvacittvasphuṭālaṅkārāvapi śabdārthau kāvyamiti /
GK16visah__u:102: yaḥ kaumāraharaḥ sa eva hi varastā eva caitrakṣapā- ste conmīlitamālatīsurabhayaḥ prauḍhāḥ kadambānilāḥ /
GK16visah__u:103: sā caivāsmi tathāpi tatra suratavyāpāralīlāvidhau revārodhasi vetasītarutale cetaḥ samutkaṇṭhate //
GK16visah__u:109: rasānvitaṃ kaviḥ kurvan kīrtiṃ prītiṃ ca vindati” //
GK16visah__u:112: “kāvyasyātmā dhvaniḥ“-- iti tatkiṃ vastvalaṅkārarasādilakṣaṇāstirūpo dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātmā,
GK16visah__u:116: nanu yadi rasādirūpamātro dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātmā, tadā--
GK16visah__u:117: attā ettha ṇimajjai ettha ahaṃ diasaaṃ paloehi /
GK16visah__u:118: mā pahia rattiandhia sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //
GK16visah__u:119: ityādau vastumātrasya vyaṅgyatve kathaṃ kāvyavyavahāra iti cet ?
GK16visah__u:121: anyathā “devadatto grāmaṃ yāti” iti vākye tadbhṛtyasya tadanusaraṇarūpavyaṅgyāvagaterapi kāvyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16visah__u:124: kāvyasya prayojanaṃ hi rasāsvādasukhapiṇḍadānadvārā vedaśāstravimukhānāṃ sukumāramatīnāṃ
GK16visah__u:135: nanu tarhi prabandhāntarvartināṃ keṣāṃcinnīrasānāṃ padyānāṃ kāvyatvaṃ na syāditi cet ?
GK16visah__u:138: yattu nīraseṣvapi guṇābhivyañjakavarṇasadbhāvaddoṣābhāvādalaṅkārasadbhāvācca kāvyavyavahāraḥ sa rasādimatkāvyabandhasāmāyādrauṇa eva /
GK16visah__u:154: “rasyate iti rasaḥ” iti vyutpattiyogādbhāvatadābhāsādayo 'pi gṛhyante tatra raso yathā--
GK16visah__u:155: śūnyaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ vilokya śayanādutthāya kiñcicchanai- rnidrāvyājamupāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyurmukham /
GK16visah__u:156: vistrabdhaṃ paricumbya jātapulakāmālokya gaṇḍasthalīṃ lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa isatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā //
GK16visah__u:170: madhu dvirephaḥ kusumaikaṇatre papau priyāṃ svāmanuvartamānaḥ /
GK16visah__u:186: dehadvāreṇova śabdārthadvāreṇa tasyaiva kāvyasyātmabhūtaṃ rasamutkarṣayantaḥ kāvyasyotkarṣakā ityucyante /
GK16visah__u:187: iha yadyapi guṇānāṃ rasadharmatvaṃ tathāpiguṇaśabdo 'tra guṇābhivyañjakaśabdārthayorupacaryate /
GK16visah__u:188: ataśca “guṇābhiñjakāḥ śabdā rasasyotkarṣakāḥ” ityuktaṃ bhavatīti prāgevoktam /
GK16visah__u:197: padoccayasyaitadabhāve 'pi vākyatve “vahninā siñciti” ityādyapi vākyaṃ syāt /
GK16visah__u:200: nirākāṅkṣasya vākyatve “gauraśvaḥ puruṣo istī” ityādīnāmapa vākyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16visah__u:202: buddhivicchede 'pi vākyatve idānīmuccāritasya devadattaśabdasya dinātnaro ccāritena gacchatīti padena saṅgatiḥ syāt /
GK16visah__u:224: artho vācyaśva lakṣyaśca vyaṅgyaśceti tridhā mataḥ // VisSd_2.2 //
GK16visah__u:227: vyaṅgyo vyañjanayā tāḥ syustistraḥ śabdasya śaktayaḥ // VisSd_2.3 //
GK16visah__u:230: uttamavṛddhena madhyamavṛddhamuddiśya “gāmānaya” ityukte taṃ gavānayanapravṛttamupalabhya bālo 'sya vākyasya “sāsnādimatpiṇḍānayanamarthaḥ” iti prathamaṃ pratipadyate,
GK16visah__u:231: anantaraṃ ca “gāṃ badhāna” “aśvamānaya” ityādāvāvāpodvāpābhyāṃ gośabdasya “sāsnādimānarthaḥ” ānayanapadasya ca “āharaṇamarthaḥ” iti saṃketamavadhārayati
GK16visah__u:236: taṃ ca saṅketitamarthaṃ bodhayantī śabdasya śaktyantarānantaritā śaktirabhidhā nāma /
GK16visah__u:237: saṅketo gṛhyate jātau guṇadravyakriyāsu ca // VisSd_2.4 //
GK16visah__u:240: śuklādayo hi gavādiraṃ sajātīyebhyaḥ kṛṣṇagavādibhyo vyāvartayanti /
GK16visah__u:250: ñasaṃbhavan yayā śabdaśaktyā svasaṃyuktān puruṣādīn pratyāyayati,
GK16visah__u:251: yayā ca “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau gaṅgādiśabdo jalamayādirūpārthavācakatvātprakṛte 'saṃbhavan svasya sāmīpyādisaṃbandhasaṃbandhinaṃ taṭādiṃ
GK16visah__u:252: sā śabdasyārpitā svābhaviketarā īśvarānudbhāvitā vā śaktirlakṣaṇā nāma /
GK16visah__u:254: uttaratra “gaṅgātaṭe ghoṣaḥ” iti pratipādanālabhyasya śītatvapāvanatvātiśayasya bodhanarūpaṃ prayojanam /
GK16visah__u:255: hetuṃ vināpi yasya kasyacitsaṃbandhino lakṣaṇo 'tiprasaṅgaḥ syāt, ityuktam--
GK16visah__u:259: kuśāṃllātīti vyutpattilabhyaḥ kuśagrāhirūpo mukhyor'thaḥ prakṛte 'saṃbhavan vivecakatvādisādharmyasambandhasambandhinaṃ dakṣarūpamarthaṃ bodhayati
GK16visah__u:263: vyutpattilabhyasya mukhyārthatve “gauḥ śete” ityatrāpi lakṣaṇā syāt /
GK16visah__u:265: iti gamadhatorḍepratyayena vyutpāditasya gośabdasya śayanakāle prayogāt /
GK16visah__u:273: anayorhi śvetādibhiḥ kuntādibhiścācetanatayā kevalairdhāvanapraveśanakriyayoḥ kartṛtayānvayamalabhamānairetatsiddhaye ātmasambandhino 'śvādayaḥ puruṣāda yaścākṣipyante /
GK16visah__u:285: “apakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate sujanatā prathitā bhavatā param /
GK16visah__u:296: viṣayiṇā anigīrṇasya viṣayasya tenaiva saha tādātmyapratītikṛtsāropā /
GK16visah__u:332: atra tailaśabdastilabhavasneharūpaṃ mukhyārthamupādāyaiva sārṣapādiṣu sneheṣu vartate /
GK16visah__u:334: rājakumāreṣu tatsadṛśeṣu ca gacchatsu“ete rājakumārā gacchanti” /
GK16visah__u:338: “rājakumārā gacchanti” rūḍhau lakṣaṇalakṣaṇā sārepā gauṇī yathā--
GK16visah__u:350: kintu svārthasahacāriguṇasājātyena vāhīkārthagatā guṇā eva lakṣyante /
GK16visah__u:365: tasmādatra gośabdo mukhyayāvṛttyā vāhīkaśabdena sahānvayamalabhamāno 'jñatvādisādharmyasaṃbandhādvāhīkārthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visah__u:369: upacāro hi nāmātyantaṃ viśakalitayoḥ śabdayoḥ sādṛśyātiśayamahimnā bhedapratītisthaganamātram /
GK16visah__u:374: prayojane yā aṣṭabhedā lakṣaṇā daśitāstāḥ prayojanarūpavyaṅgyasya gūḍhāgūḍhatayā pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā ṣoḍhaśa bhedāḥ /
GK16visah__u:385: etā anantaroktāḥ ṣoḍaśabhedā lakṣaṇāḥ phalasya dharmigatatvena dharmagatatvena ca pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā dvātriṃśadbhedāḥ /
GK16visah__u:387: “strigdhaśyāmalakāntiliptaviyato velladvalākā ghanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ /
GK16visah__u:388: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava” //
GK16visah__u:389: atrātyantaduḥkhasahiṣṇurūpe rāme dharmiṇi lakṣye tasyaivātiśayaḥ phalam /
GK16visah__u:405: tisṛṣu vṛttiṣu svaṃ svamarthaṃ bodhayitvopakṣīṇāsu yathā aparo 'nyo 'nyor'tho bodhyate
GK16visah__u:432: “bhāti rathāṅgam” rathāṅgam” iti napuṃsakavyaktyā rathāṅgaṃ cakram /
GK16visah__u:433: svarastu veda eva viśeṣapratītikṛnna kāvya iti tasya viṣayo nodāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visah__u:436: udāttādirūpo 'pi muneḥ pāṭhoktadiśā śṛṅgārādirasaviśeṣapratītikṛdeva” iti etadviṣaye udāharaṇamucitameva iti,
GK16visah__u:438: svarāḥ kākkādayaḥ udāttādayo vā vyaṅgyarūpameva viśeṣaṃ pratyāyanti,
GK16visah__u:440: kiñca yadi yatra kvacidanekārthaśabdānāṃ prakaraṇādiniyamābhāvādaniyantritayorapyarthayoranurūpasvaravaśenaikatra niyamanaṃ vācyaṃ,
GK16visah__u:441: tadā tathāvidhasthale śleṣānaṅgīkāraprasaṅgaḥ; na ca tathā,
GK16visah__u:446: evamekasminnarthe 'bhidhayā niyantrite yā śabdārthasyānyārthabuddhihetuḥ śaktiḥ sābhidhāmūlā vyañjanā /
GK16visah__u:448: “durgālaṅghitavigraho manasijaṃ saṃmīlayaṃstejasā prodyadrājakalo gṛhītagarimā viṣvagvṛto bhogibhiḥ /
GK16visah__u:449: nakṣatreśakṛ tekṣaṇo girigurau gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ dhārayan gāmākramya vibhūtibhūṣitatanū rājatyumāvallabhaḥ” //
GK16visah__u:450: atra prakaraṇonābhidhayā umāvallabhaśabdasyomānāmnīmahādevīvallabhabhānudevanṛpatirūper'the niyantrite vyañjanayaiva gaurīvallabharūpor'tho bodhyate /
GK16visah__u:454: yayā pratyāyyate sā syādvyañjanā lakṣaṇāśrayā // VisSd_2.15 //
GK16visah__u:455: “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau jalamayādyarthabodhanādabhidhāyāṃ taṭādyarthabodhanācca lakṣaṇāyāṃ viratāyāṃ yayā śītatvapāvanatvādyatiśayādirbodhyate sā lakṣaṇāmūlā vyañjanā /
GK16visah__u:461: “kālo madhuḥ kupita eṣa ca puṣpadhanvā dhīrā vahanti ratikhedaharāḥ samīrāḥ /
GK16visah__u:462: kelīvanīyamapi vañjulakuñjamañjur- dūre patiḥ kathaya kiṃ karaṇīyamadya” //
GK16visah__u:463: atraitaṃ deśaṃ prati śīghraṃ pracchannakāmukastvayā preṣyatāmiti sakhīṃ prati kayācidvyajyate /
GK16visah__u:465: “niḥ śeṣacyutacandanaṃ stanataṭaṃ nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dharo netre dūramanañjane pulakitā tanvī taveyaṃ tanuḥ /
GK16visah__u:468: bāndhavajanasyājñātapīḍāgame vāpīṃ snātumito gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikm” //
GK16visah__u:469: atra tadantikameva rantuṃ gatāsīti viparītalakṣaṇayā lakṣyam /
GK16visah__u:470: tasya ca rantumiti vyaṅgyaṃ pratipādyaṃ dūtīvaiśiṣṭyādbodhyate /
GK16visah__u:478: ataḥ saṃketasthānametaditi kayāpi saṃnihitaṃ pracchannakāmukaṃ pratyucyate /
GK16visah__u:491: atra saṃdhyā saṃketakāla iti paṅmanimīlanādiceṣṭayā kayāciddyotyate /
GK16visah__u:495: tatra vācyārthasya vyañjanā yathā-“kālo madhuḥ-” ityādi /
GK16visah__u:511: tātparyārthaṃ tadarthaṃ ca vākyaṃ tadvodhakaṃ pare // VisSd_2.20 //
GK16visah__u:512: abhidhāyā ekaikapadārthabodhanavirāmādvākyārtharūpasya padārthānvayasya bodhikā tātpaya nāma vṛttiḥ /
GK16visah__u:515: ihi sāhityārpaṇo vākyasvarūpanirūpaṇo nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ /
GK16visah__u:522: vyakto dadhyādinyāyena rūpāntarapariṇato vyaktīkṛta eva raso na tu dīpena ghaṭa iva pūrvasiddho vyajyate /
GK16visah__u:524: “rasāḥ pratīyanta iti tvodanaṃ pacatītivad vyavahāraḥ” iti /
GK16visah__u:525: atra ca ratyādipadopādānādeva prāpte sathāyitve punaḥ sthāyipadopādānaṃ ratyādīnāmapi rasāntaraṣvasthāyitvapratipādanārtham /
GK16visah__u:534: “rajastamobhyāmaspṛṣṭaṃ manaḥ satvamihocyate” ityuktaprakāro bāhyameyavimukhatāpādakaḥ kaścanāntaro dharmaḥ sattvam /
GK16visah__u:537: akhaṇḍa ityeka evāyaṃ vibhāvādiratyādiprakāśasukhacamatkārātmakaḥ atra hetuṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visah__u:552: tathāpi “rasaḥ svādyate” iti kālpanikaṃ bhedamurarī kṛtya karmakarttari vā prayogaḥ /
GK16visah__u:553: taduktam-“rasyamānatāmātrasāratvāt prakāśaśarīrādananya eva hi rasaḥ” iti /
GK16visah__u:555: nanvetāvatā rasasyājñeyatvamuktaṃ bhavatīti vyañjanāyāśca jñānaviśeṣatvād dvayoraikyamāpatitam /
GK16visah__u:559: ityuktadiśā ghaṭapradīpavadvyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ pārthakyameveti kathaṃ rasasya vyaṅgyateti cet,
GK16visah__u:563: ata eva hi rasanāsvādanacamatkaraṇādayo vilakṣaṇā eva vyapadeśāḥ” iti /
GK16visah__u:565: nanu tarhi karuṇādīnāṃ rasānāṃ duḥ khayatvādrasatvaṃ (tadunmukhatvaṃ )
GK16visah__u:571: kiñca teṣu yadā duḥkhaṃ na ko 'pi syāttadunmukhaḥ /
GK16visah__u:572: nahi kaścat sacetā ātmano duḥkhāya pravarttate /
GK16visah__u:579: śokaharṣādayo loke jāyantāṃ nāma laukikāḥ // VisSd_3.6 //
GK16visah__u:581: sukhaṃ sañjāyate tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'pīti kā kṣatiḥ // VisSd_3.7 //
GK16visah__u:582: ye khalu rāmavanavāsādayo loke “duḥkhāraṇāni” ityucyante ta eva hi kāvyanāṭyasamarpitā
GK16visah__u:584: tebhyaśca surate dantadhātādibhya iva sukhameva jāyate /
GK16visah__u:585: ataśca “laukikaśokaharṣādikāraṇobhyo laukikaśokaharṣādayo jāyante” iti loka eva pratiniyamaḥ /
GK16visah__u:586: kāvye puna) “sarvebhyo 'pi vibhāvādibhyaḥ sukhameva jāyate” iti niyamānna kaściddoṣaḥ /
GK16visah__u:587: kathaṃ tarhi hariścandrādicaritasya kāvyanāṭyayorapi darśanaśravaṇābhyāmaśrupātā dayo jāyanta ityucyate--
GK16visah__u:589: tarhi kathaṃ kāvyataḥ sarveṣāmīdṛśī rasābhivyaktirna jāyata ityata āha--
GK16visah__u:590: na jāyate tadāsvādo vinā ratyādivāsanām // VisSd_3.8 //
GK16visah__u:592: tatra yadyādyā na syāttadā śrotriyajaranmīmāṃsakādīnāmapi sa syāt /
GK16visah__u:593: yadi dvitīyā na syāttadā yadragiṇā mapi keṣāñcidrasodvodho na dṛśyate tanna syāt /
GK16visah__u:610: parasya na parasyeti mameti na mameti ca /
GK16visah__u:611: tadāsvāde vibhāvādeḥ paricchedo na vidyate // VisSd_3.12 //
GK16visah__u:614: alaukikatvameteṣāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ na tu dūṣaṇam // VisSd_3.13 //
GK16visah__u:619: vibhāvādīnāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kāraṇakāryyasahakāritve kathaṃ trayāṇāmapi rasodbodhe kāraṇatvamityucyate --
GK16visah__u:621: rasodvodhe vibhāvādyāḥ kāraṇānyeva te matāḥ // VisSd_3.14 //
GK16visah__u:622: nanu tarhi kathaṃ rasāsvāde teṣāmekaḥ pratibhāsa ityucyate--
GK16visah__u:624: tataḥ sambalitaḥ sarvo vibhāvādiḥ sacetasām // VisSd_3.15 //
GK16visah__u:626: yathā khaṇḍamaricādīnāṃ sammelanādapūrvva iva kaścidāsvādaḥ prapāṇakarase sañjāyate vibhāvādisammelanādihāpi tathetyarthaḥ /

GK16visah__u:639: sītādidarśanādijo rāmādiratyādyudbodho hi parimito laukiko nāṭyakāvyadarśanādeḥ sāntarāyaśca,

GK16visah__u:679: nanu yadi raso na kāryastatkathaṃ mahaṣiṇā(ka)
GK16visah__u:682: yadyapi rasābhinnatayā carvaṇasyāpi na kāryatvaṃ tathāpi tasya kādācitkatayā upacaritena kāryatvena kāryatvamupacaryate /

GK16visah__u:693: “yadyapi rasānanyatayā carvaṇāpi na kāryā tathāpi kādācitkatayā kāryatvamupakalpya tadekātmanyanādivāsanāpariṇatirūpe ratyādibhāve 'pi vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ” iti /
GK16visah__u:694: “sukhāditādātmyāḍgīkāre cāsmākī siddhāntaśayyāmadhiśayya divyaṃ varṣasahastraṃ pramodanidrāmupeyāḥ” iti ca /

GK16visah__u:761: śoṇaṃ vīkṣya mukhaṃ vicumbitumahaṃ yātaḥ samīpaṃ tataḥ pādena prahṛtaṃ tayā,

GK16visah__u:7214: yathā laukikālaṅkārāṇāmapi parasparamiśraṇe pṛthakcārutvena pṛthagalaṅkāratvaṃ tathoktarūpāṇāṃ kāvyālaṅkārāṇāmapi parasparamiśratve saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkārākhyau pṛthagalaṅkārau /
GK16visah__u:7227: saṃdigdhatve ca bhavati saṅkarastrividhaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_10.98 //
GK16visah__u:7232: sā ca mandā kinyā vastuvṛttena yatpādamūlaveṣṭanaṃ taccaraṇamūlaveṣṭanamiti śleṣamutthāpayatīti tasyāṅgam /
GK16visah__u:7245: athavā idamiti mukhasya candramaṇḍalasya ca dvayorapi prakṛtayorekadharmābhisaṃbandhāttulyayogitā,
GK16visah__u:7249: yadvā manmathoddīpanaḥ kālaḥ svakāryabhūtacandravarṇanāmukhena vaṇita iti paryāyoktiriti bahūnāmalaṅkarāṇāṃ saṃdehātsaṃdehasaṅkaraḥ /
GK16visah__u:7250: yathā vā--“mukhacandraṃ paśyāmi” ityatra kiṃ mukhaṃ candra iva ityupamā ?
GK16visah__u:7256: “mukhacandraḥ prakāśate” ityatra prakāśākhyo dharmo rūpakasya sādhako mukhe upacaritatvena saṃbhavatīti nopamābādhakaḥ /
GK16visah__u:7258: atra yoṣita āliṅganaṃ nāyakasya sādṛśye nocitamiti lakṣmyāliṅganasya rājanyāsaṃbhavādupamābādhakam,
GK16visah__u:7264: evaṃ--“sundaraṃ vadanāmbujam” ityādau sādhāraṇadharmaprayoge “upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge” iti vacanādupamāsamāso na saṃbhavatītyupamāyā bādhakaḥ /
GK16visah__u:7267: “kaṭākṣeṇāpīṣatkṣaṇamapi nirīkṣeta yadi sā tadānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati pihitāśeṣaviṣayaḥ /
GK16visah__u:7273: yathā vā--“kurabakāravakāraṇatāṃ yayuḥ” ityatra rabakā ravakā ityekaṃ bakāravakāra ityekamiti yamakayoḥ /
GK16visah__u:7280: sāhityadarpaṇamamuṃ sudhiyo vilokya sāhityatattvamakhilaṃ sukhameva vitta // VisSd_10.99 //
GK16visah__u:7282: tāvanmanaḥ saṃmadayan kavīnāmeṣa prabandhaḥ prathito 'stu loke // VisSd_10.100 //
